name: The Last Space Wanderer
description:
--PC Controls--

Movement: A|D or ←|→

Laser: Spacebar or Click and hold.

Time Freeze Power Up: 1 or Click over the Star Icon(Cooldown haven't been implemented yet).

--Mobile Controls--

Movement: Tilt.

Laser: Touch and hold.

Time Freeze Power Up:  Tap over the Star Icon (Cooldown haven't been implemented yet).

--Known current bugs & issues--

  • This game works on mobile browsers in Android, for some reason I haven't been able to make it work on iOS devices.
  • Sometimes the player's ship is destroyed but the game keeps running.
  • Sometimes audio stops on mobile browsers.
